text: You wake up in a strange room with no memory of how you got there. There's a door on the far side of the room and a window that leads to a dark alleyway. What do you do?

options.text: Check the door
Look out the window
Search the room

text: You see a shadowy figure in the alleyway further away. They seem to be having a conversation. What do you do?

options.text: Try to break the window with an axe and escape
Try to get their attention with the emergency flare
Ignore them and continue searching the room

text: The door is locked. There's a keypad next to it. What do you do?

options.text: Try to guess the code
Search the room for clues
Give up and go back to bed

text: You find a note on the nightstand that reads 'Don't trust anyone.' unfortunately, there is a bug behind the paper and it bites you on the hand so 50% of your health is lost. What do you do?

options.text: Go back to bed
Try to find more clues in the room with emergency flare
Try to open the door again

text: The figure reveals themselves to be a friendly ally who can help you escape. However, they need your help first. What do you do?

options.text: Agree to help them
Refuse to help them and continue searching for clues
Try to escape on your own

text: You guess the code and the door unlocks. However, an alarm goes off. What do you do?

options.text: Try to disable the alarm with the plier by cutting the cables
Run back to the bed and hide
Run through the door and escape

text: You successfully nailed it and escaped. Along the way, you got hurt by stepping on the broken wood piece which make you lose HEALTH 30%. However, you are now outside in a dangerous city. What do you do?

options.text: Look for shelter
Try to find help
Go it alone

text: You find a hidden compartment in the room containing a key. What do you do?

options.text: Use the key to open the door
try to break the lock with an axe
Keep the key and continue searching

text: After You make it out of the building, find yourself in a park. However, you see a group of suspicious individuals approaching you. What do you do?

options.text: Try to blend in and hide
Try to fight them off
Try to run away

text: You help your ally and they help you escape. However, they reveal that they need your help for a bigger mission. What do you do?

options.text: Agree to help them
Refuse to help them and try to go your own way
Run through the door and escape

text: You continue on your plan to cut it out, but soon realize you've lost your sense of direction to cut it out the wire as there are a lot of wires behind the alarm.As you touch with the bare hand, you got electric shock which make you lose 50% of your health. What do u do?

options.text: Cut all of the wires
Run through the doors
Find something useful in the room

text: You look around for any clues that might help you figure out how you got there. You find a piece of paper with an address written on it.

options.text: you leave the room for more clues
decide to try to imagine what happened
Go back to sleep and heal

text: your eyes got closed and try to remember. You see yourself standing in front of a group of people are running towards you, and they seem like they are trying to do something

options.text: Try to blend in and hide
Try to fight them off
Try to run away

text: You meet with two strangers who wear like the witch in the films. They wanted you to answer honestly related to your personal life to cure your injuries.

options.text: Try to lie to them by telling goods things you won't do
sitting in silence and trying to consider whether it is just a dream or reality
Try to answer the things correctly and how you regret that

text: You are taking so long to answer, so they just vanish away and there is nothing you can hope to happen. In the end, you just freeze to death in the middle of nowhere while waiting for them to come back sitting there
After You cut all the wires, the sound stops but you hear some footsteps coming to you.

options.text: you try to run away as fast as you can
you try to fight them with the knife
you decide to wait and ask for help

text: They just identified that you were fake. so they take out your soul and you can't move your body anymore. You are trapped in that imaginary world forever.
You unfortunately defeat the people, but are injured in the process. Your health is lost for 60%. They thought you are dead so they leave you behind.

options.text: go back to where you started to sleep and heal your health.
Try to close your eyes and wish for the good to happen using the magic pill
You try to run away from that building

text: You try to outrun them but you can't as they seem not to be people. So you just stop and wait for them but they just kept disappearing into somewhere and appearing from somewhere else. Later you hear the voices of people asking one question (Why we should let you get back to your normal life ?) in unison.

options.text: Try to lie them by telling goods things you won't do
sitting in silence and try to consider it is just dream or reality
Try to answer the things you regret in the past and how you want to fix

text: They tell you that (you are meant to be alive and this will be over soon). After that, someone touch your shoulder with a cold hand from the back, and you just wake up and realize that it was just a nightmare.
